website_summaries.verdict: If you need a small yet stylish vanity, this is a good choice for you. Otherwise, consider others we reviewed.
pros: Has sleek nickel hardware and hardwood cabinet in a 30-inch model that fits tight spaces
cons: The price is a bit high for a small vanity, yet the marble top doesn't have the quality of others we tested

customer_reviews.title: We very very happy initially, but now all the drawers and doors ...
customer_reviews.text: We very very happy initially, but now all the drawers and doors on front are bubbling/cracking. They are not exposed to any greater water or humidity than what would be expected in a typical bathroom (which has a fan used at every shower). Looking at options to rebuild them with actual wood instead of particle wood. Contacted the seller twice and received no response. Amazon said it was outside the 90 days for the A to Z guarantee to reply, so we’re stuck with this $1,000+ vanity that is falling apart in less than a year of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dawner80

customer_reviews.title: This vanity is great! It looks beautiful and has great storage for ...
customer_reviews.text: Art of Bath/Disco Bath is the worst company to deal with! They are scammers! They shipped a defective vanity and keep promising that they have shipped a replacement month after month but they never have. Now I feel like they did this to try and get past Amazons 90 day refund window. The counter top came with marks all the way across the top and the wood front is starting to crack apart. Pics are attached.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet.Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Positively LOVE this vanity. The offset of the sink gives nice (not a LOT) but nice room on the right to have toothbrushes. and other electronic things that need to be plugged in and I want accessible. The quality is exactly what I wanted... high quality. Boxed extremely well for delivery. Soft close drawers with plenty of room for everything. I was concerned that the side drawers would be too small.They are not. The marble is very high end and beautiful. I would definitely by this again. I love it and am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Designer quality and function
customer_reviews.text: We have a tiny guest bathroom and was desperately outdated. This is PERFECT in every way. There is ample storage, the counter top is stunning, the hardware is designer quality and the mirror is the ideal balance. With the offset sink there is much needed counter space too. We added brushed nickel faucets and vanity light and it is now the best room in the house. We are looking forward to updating the master bath too with products that are as close to this as possible. You will be amazed at how beautiful and functional these pieces are and how great they look.
customer_reviews.author: savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: I love it, perfect for my bathroom. I have space for all my junk. I never had drawers in my bathroom so this is wonderful. Good quality I didn't use the back splash because I put the unit in the corner of the bathroom. The unit did not come with a side splash and it would be to hard to match the marble so I used 16 inch white subway tiles for the back and side and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: santa barbara girl

customer_reviews.title: The white carrara marble top has beautiful movement, and the seller drilled 3 holes to ...
customer_reviews.text: This luxury vanity has serious storage. The white carrara marble top has beautiful movement, and the seller drilled 3 holes to accommodate my faucet. Top grade finish and round levels on the legs to put it in perfect balance. It is a high grade piece of furniture. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Stylish traditional vanity
customer_reviews.text: Luv this vanity...came completely assembled...very heavy...sink already set into the beautiful marble top...soft close drawers...plenty of storage... Would have given it a 5...but it got some minor damage during shipping...fabulous customer service...
customer_reviews.author: Moana

customer_reviews.title: Lots of beauty and storage for little spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This vanity is beautiful and I love all of the drawers! I was so glad to find this style in the small size that I needed to fit my space. I bought two-one for each bathroom! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I was looking for a 30" and with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I was looking for a 30" and with the offset sink, it gives me counter space. It looks like a piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful with maximum storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. You will not find more storage in a vanity with these dimensions. I looked everywhere. Great quality -- well above what you would find at a home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: DRCosby

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our bathroom and put in this vanity. It’s very solid construction, has a very nice marble top, and it looks great in our bathroom! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture was worth the wait. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Quality worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I could tell that there was care involved with this product simply by how it was packed for shipment. Well-made, beautiful construction, soft close doors and drawers, beautiful finish, exquisite marble top and backsplash. Installed yesterday, looking forward to many years of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple spots on the marble top that look like they will be an issue- like a flaw or ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a couple spots on the marble top that look like they will be an issue- like a flaw or the top is chipped. There is also a piece of wood chipped off BUT its in the inside of the cabinet and won't be seen. I'm more concerned with the marble top. :( Other than that, I'm fine with it. Drawers work nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hissom

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Look no further.Excellent craftsmanship! This vanity has everything you need in a 30 " vanity. Beautiful marble top! Hassle free from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Factory Paint Peels Prematurely
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was terrific initially. They were very responsive and even had the doors cut for different handles. However, within less than one year, the surface factory paint on two areas of the doors began to peel. I contacted our customer service rep Indhira, and asked to purchase replacement doors. She verified which doors they were, but then I heard nothing else. I've been waiting for a response for about five weeks now... Hoping she'll write back soon. Until then, it's one star for the Eviva Acclaim. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy eviva!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this no stars if possible. I bought this in grey and the backsplash came broken. I contacted the eviva directly and each time was told someone would get back to me. No one did- big surprise. When I finally spoke to someone other than the guy who answers the phone, I was told there was nothing they could do. They don’t honor their 1 yr manufacture warranty at all, says it only covers normal wear and tear. They also said they had no record of the multiple calls I had made. This is the worst company I’ve ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Eviva EVVN69-30WH Acclaim 30" White Transitional w Carrara Top bathroom Vanities
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Acclaim Caroline 30 inch single under-mount sink vanity is constructed of solid wood with a durable water resistant polyurethane finish outside and water resistant layer inside. The Acclaim Caroline vanity comes with a White carrera marble top that provides the bathroom with a contemporary/transitional look. Price includes: bathroom cabinet, counter-top, sink, hardware.
feature_bullets: Soft closing doors & drawers, dovetail drawers
Includes pure White Carrera marble counter-top & a double White porcelain sink
open back for easy plumbing access

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars22 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
